title: firmware update
extract: Tap "Check Update" in "Settings" -> "About" -> "System update" to check if the firmware is the latest version. If there is a newer version available, please follow the steps shown on screen to execute the update. You can also go to the ASUS Official Website to download newer firmware and instruction manuals.Apr 25, 2018
extract_html: Tap "Check Update" in "Settings" -> "About" -> "System update" to check if the firmware is the latest version. If there is a newer version available, please follow the steps shown on screen to execute the update. You can also go to the ASUS Official Website to download newer firmware and instruction manuals.Apr 25, 2018
